A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Slow\, dull\, uninspiring\, overly politicised\, chaotic story telling with no real meaning and several long scenes that felt like filler\, which ultimately made no difference at all to the overall plot.

The humour is cringey\, and destroys that willing suspension of disbelief. The overall theme of the movie really seemed to be about dashing the meaning and importance of all previous films in the series\, including episode 7\, with several much-anticipated plot points being played down or entirely abandoned. 

Most characters were unlikable and superficial\, I really couldn't empathise with any character and this made it even more difficult for me to invest in what is\, to put it bluntly\, a poorly written and produced corporate cash-grab.
